condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left hand side; almost regularly cut at the top; Irregularly cut at the right and bottom sides. Although the number of col. 98 in the publication, P. Mich. 224, p.251, is written without brackets, the number is no longer visible as the fibers have been lost since the time of publication. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer.For some reason big dots of ink can be noticed at the top of the papyrus, as well as on Verso. The scribe has washed out line, which suppose to be no. 23. There are 12 lines on the back of col. 98 and 4 in the intercolumniation. (MA)
